name: Ethans Arena +
description:
Ethans Arena + is a stupid fighting game (maybe the first in a series) that was made in spare  time during my school assesment period.

Story: Two idiots decide they are bored of doing nothing and decide to use the random weapons falling from the sky to fight each other.

Gameplay: Each round, each player has 5 hp. Each attack does 1 damage but can do combos if used correctly.

Music: All the music is royalty free and made by Brandon 'Cityfires' Ellis.

Updates: The game may or may not get updates. Depends if I am bored/busy.
